languages.text: "Настоятельница Лугналия яростно защищает права Ордена и, кажется, успела внушить Эксплораторам праведный страх. Возможно, их пиетет удержит их от мести в случае, если диспут завершится не в их пользу".

"Prelate Lugnalia is vehemently defending the rights of the Order and seems to have managed to instil a touch of righteous fear in the Explorators. Perhaps it will keep them from taking revenge if the dispute does not conclude in their favour."
languages.original_text: "Настоятельница Лугналия яростно защищает права Ордена и, кажется, успела внушить Эксплораторам праведный страх. Возможно, их пиетет удержит их от мести в случае, если диспут завершится не в их пользу".

languages.text: “拉格娜里娅教长竭力捍卫修会的权利，她似乎也成功地向开拓者们灌输了一丝正义的恐惧。如果争端的结果对那些开拓者不利，那这一丝恐惧或许能阻止他们的报复行为。”
languages.original_text: "Prelate Lugnalia is vehemently defending the rights of the Order and seems to have managed to instil a touch of righteous fear in the Explorators. Perhaps it will keep them from taking revenge if the dispute does not conclude in their favour."

traits.locale_text: “拉格娜里娅教长竭力捍卫修会的权利，她似乎也成功地向开拓者们灌输了一丝正义的恐惧。如果争端的结果对那些开拓者不利，那这一丝恐惧或许能阻止他们的报复行为。”
“拉格娜里娅院长竭力捍卫修会的权利，她似乎也成功地向开拓者们灌输了一丝正义的恐惧。如果争端的结果对那些开拓者不利，那这一丝恐惧或许能阻止他们的报复行为。”

languages.text: «La prelada Lugnalia defiende con vehemencia los derechos de la Orden y parece haber conseguido infundir un ápice de temor religioso en los exploradores. Quizá eso les impida vengarse si la disputa no acaba a su favor».
languages.original_text: "Prelate Lugnalia is vehemently defending the rights of the Order and seems to have managed to instil a touch of righteous fear in the Explorators. Perhaps it will keep them from taking revenge if the dispute does not conclude in their favour."

traits.locale_text: «La prelada Lugnalia defiende con vehemencia los derechos de la Orden y parece haber conseguido infundir un ápice de temor religioso en los exploradores. Quizá eso les impida vengarse si la disputa no acaba a su favor».

languages.text: 「司教ルグナリアは修道会の権利を擁護し、エクスプロレイターたちに正義の恐怖を植え付けることに成功したようだ。自分たちに有利な結論が出なかったとしても、そうすることで彼らからの復讐を回避することができるのだろう」
languages.original_text: "Prelate Lugnalia is vehemently defending the rights of the Order and seems to have managed to instil a touch of righteous fear in the Explorators. Perhaps it will keep them from taking revenge if the dispute does not conclude in their favour."

traits.locale_text: 「大教母ルグナリアは修道会の権利を擁護し、エクスプロレイターたちに正義の恐怖を植え付けることに成功したようだ。自分たちに有利な結論が出なかったとしても、そうすることで彼らからの復讐を回避することができるのだろう」
「大教母ルグナリアは修道会の権利を擁護し、エクスプロレイターたちに正義の恐怖を植え付けることに成功したようだ。自分たちに有利な結論が出なかったとしても、そうすることで彼らからの復讐を回避することができるのだろう」

languages.text: « La prélate Lugnalia défend avec véhémence les droits de l'Ordre et semble avoir réussi à susciter la crainte des Explorators. Voilà qui les empêchera peut-être de se venger si le différend se conclut en leur défaveur. »
languages.original_text: "Prelate Lugnalia is vehemently defending the rights of the Order and seems to have managed to instil a touch of righteous fear in the Explorators. Perhaps it will keep them from taking revenge if the dispute does not conclude in their favour."

traits.locale_text: « La prélate Lugnalia défend avec véhémence les droits de l'Ordre et semble avoir réussi à susciter la crainte des Explorators. Voilà qui les empêchera peut-être de se venger si le différend se conclut en leur défaveur. »

languages.text: "Prälatin Lugnalia verteidigt vehement die Rechte des Ordens und scheint den Exploratoren einen Funken rechtschaffener Furcht eingeimpft zu haben. Vielleicht hält sie das davon ab, Rache zu nehmen, wenn der Disput nicht zu ihren Gunsten endet."
languages.original_text: "Prelate Lugnalia is vehemently defending the rights of the Order and seems to have managed to instil a touch of righteous fear in the Explorators. Perhaps it will keep them from taking revenge if the dispute does not conclude in their favour."

traits.locale_text: "Prälatin Lugnalia verteidigt vehement die Rechte des Ordens und scheint den Exploratoren einen Funken rechtschaffener Furcht eingeimpft zu haben. Vielleicht hält sie das davon ab, Rache zu nehmen, wenn der Disput nicht zu ihren Gunsten endet."

"Äbtissin Lugnalia verteidigt vehement die Rechte des Ordens und scheint den Exploratoren einen Funken rechtschaffener Furcht eingeimpft zu haben. Vielleicht hält sie das davon ab, Rache zu nehmen, wenn der Disput nicht zu ihren Gunsten endet."

languages.text: "Piskopos Lugnalia, Tarikat'ın haklarını kıyasıya savunuyor. Görünüşe göre Keşiftörlerin yüreğine bir nebze de olsa erdemlilik korkusu sindirmeyi başarmış. Belki de bu sayede tartışma lehlerine sonuçlanmazsa intikam almaya kalkışmazlar."
languages.original_text: "Prelate Lugnalia is vehemently defending the rights of the Order and seems to have managed to instil a touch of righteous fear in the Explorators. Perhaps it will keep them from taking revenge if the dispute does not conclude in their favour."

traits.locale_text: "Piskopos Lugnalia, Tarikat'ın haklarını kıyasıya savunuyor. Görünüşe göre Keşiftörlerin yüreğine bir nebze de olsa erdemlilik korkusu sindirmeyi başarmış. Belki de bu sayede tartışma lehlerine sonuçlanmazsa intikam almaya kalkışmazlar."
